name: Verify that direct connection is established using user with minimum authorisation,user is able to fetch Bapi Schema.

steps.name: Given  Base Url is known to connect with direct connection for BAPI schema of "BusinessArea.GetDetail"
When  user calls the bapi list by "bapiSchema" with GET http request
Then  API call got success with Bapi list with status code 200
And  API response has RESPONSE_DETAIL[1].properties[1].name and CODE
